document_data.mainbody:
Mal Feargal was a lake located on the island of Snowdown within the Moonshae Isles.
Mal Feargal was the northernmost and smallest of Snowdowns three freshwater lakes. It was found on the north side of the island east of Andover Heights. Mal Feargal was not fed by any rivers. The town of Llandrain was located along its southern shore.
